ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnmet | |- ( abs o. - ) e. ( Met ` CC ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) = ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnxmet | |- ( abs o. - ) e. ( *Met ` CC ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_mopntopon | |- ( ( abs o. - ) e. ( *Met ` CC ) -> ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) e. ( TopOn ` CC ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 6 |  | #P_cnfldtset | |- ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) = ( TopSet ` CCfld ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_topontopn | |- ( ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) e. ( TopOn ` CC ) -> ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 4, 7 | #P_mp2b | |- ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_absf | |- abs : CC --> RR |
| 10 |  | #P_subf | |- - : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC |
| 11 |  | #P_fco | |- ( ( abs : CC --> RR /\ - : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC ) -> ( abs o. - ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> RR ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_mp2an | |- ( abs o. - ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> RR |
| 13 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( ( abs o. - ) : ( CC X. CC ) --> RR -> ( abs o. - ) Fn ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fnresdm | |- ( ( abs o. - ) Fn ( CC X. CC ) -> ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) = ( abs o. - ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 13, 14 | #P_mp2b | |- ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) = ( abs o. - ) |
| 16 |  | #P_cnfldds | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( dist ` CCfld ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_reseq1i | |- ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) = ( ( dist ` CCfld ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_eqtr3i | |- ( abs o. - ) = ( ( dist ` CCfld ) |` ( CC X. CC ) ) |
| 19 | 8, 5, 18 | #P_isms2 | |- ( CCfld e. MetSp <-> ( ( abs o. - ) e. ( Met ` CC ) /\ ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) = ( MetOpen ` ( abs o. - ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 19 | #P_mpbir2an | |- CCfld e. MetSp |
